reference.title: Errata 02 change list
reference.shortdesc: This topic lists the changes that have been made to DITA Version 1.3 Plus Errata 01. It includes separate topics for the written specification, content models, and grammar files.

section.p: The following conventions are used to indicate changes:

ul.li: Deletions are indicated with line through and red text, for example, deletion.
Insertions are indicated with underlining and green text, for example, insertion.
